bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: UI server requres JVM arg to run
bug.description: Currently, running the UI server will fail, unless the user manually adds a -Dplay.crypto.secret="somestringhere" JVM arg to their launch.

comments.comment: /cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/wmeddie>@wmeddie</denchmark-link> this is related to the DEV -> PROD changes.
